commit.message:
call.c (build_op_call_1): Use TYPE_PTRFN_P and TYPE_REFFN_P.

2013-03-29  Paolo Carlini  <paolo.carlini@oracle.com>

	* call.c (build_op_call_1): Use TYPE_PTRFN_P and TYPE_REFFN_P.

From-SVN: r197253

files.patch:

+	* call.c (build_op_call_1): Use TYPE_PTRFN_P and TYPE_REFFN_P.

 	* call.c (add_builtin_candidate): Use TYPE_PTR_P and VOID_TYPE_P.
